descriptionHtml:
in Whiterun there is a shop Arcadia's Cauldron the amulet rests on the counter in front of the merchant. As the pics show just stand behind her to steal it with no problems (no crouching required).
note that even though the Amulet will cure any and all diseases it will not prevent you from getting them, I wear mine all the time and when I contract something then I just take it off then put it back on and disease gone.
the only benefit really to wear and just leave it on is other than you know right where it is, it gives a nice glowing effect that the NPCs around you will surely comment on
author: Ghhost
